name: Double Hop
description:
This game is a submission to the GMTK game jam 2021. And it follows the theme "Joined Together" in this way: 

The actions did by the player character are joined together. Mark Brown also asked "What does it mean for the connection to break?" - In my game it means a huge risk for the player because of the Sudden Death mechanic.

Credits

Game by Ryder Studios

Music by Oathr VGM

Sound Fx assets used:

https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/magic-spells-sound-effects-...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle-15...

and I used this shader asset

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/all-in-1-sprite-shader-156513

Controls

 A D or left and right arrow keys to move

space to jump or confirm in the mainmenu

q to go back to the menu

W S or up and down arrow keys to navigate between buttons in the menu
